summary: Implements the Qt‑based driver that connects the TagStudio core engine with a full‑featured graphical user interface, orchestrating application configuration, the Qt event loop, background tasks, drag‑and‑drop handling, dialogs, and various UI components such as panels, previews and progress indicators. Also supplies a lightweight helper for initializing settings and executing data‑processing jobs.
business_intent: Provide an intuitive desktop client that enables users to organize, tag, and browse media collections through a responsive Qt interface, leveraging the underlying TagStudio engine to deliver efficient asset management and processing capabilities.
